attributes.action: We should be able to vote to stay in the EU
attributes.additional_details: The Brexit campaign encouraged voters to vote for diversion of money to the NHS. This is now retracted, and the other pillar of of BREXIT is  no longer valid as it is now clear we in the UK cannot rely on any EU immigration controls
attributes.background: We had untruths in the BREXIT campaign which are now retracted and we now know that there must be many compromises that no-one voted for. Democracy does not exist in UK
